pageContent: Objectives: To explore an alternative approach to quantifying the burden of side effects at 1 year after treatment for prostate cancer among both patients and their partners.

metaData.source:
Factors associated with satisfaction with prostate cancer care: results from Cancer of the Prostate Strategic Urologic Research Endeavor (CaPSURE)
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22928860/
